ARABIC: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ إِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ ٱنفَطَرَتْ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: When the sky is split apart,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: WHEN THE SKY is split asunder,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: When the heaven is split asunder,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: When the heavens are rent asunder,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: When the heaven is cleft asunder (Infatarat).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: When the heaven becomes cleft asunder,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: When the heaven is cleft asunder,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: When the sky is cleft asunder;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: When the heaven shall be cleft,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: When the sky is rent apart,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: When the Sky is cleft asunder;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: When the heaven is cleft asunder.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [82:1] When the heaven is split open, [when it is] rent asunder,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And from his narration on the authority of Ibn 'Abbas that he said regarding the interpretation of Allah's saying (When the heaven is cleft asunder): '(When the heaven is cleft asunder) by the descent of the Lord-a descent without modality-and the angels and whatever He wills of His command, 736
